pages.text: The $(major)Ender Dragon Health$(0) Gene allows players to $(minor)completely negate damage$() while a $(major)Dragon Health Crystal$(0) is in their inventory.$(br2)Any damage they would take is instead dealt to the Crystal's durability.$(br2)This Gene $(minor)cannot be given to mobs$(0).
By default, you can get this gene from the following mobs:$(br2)â€¢ Ender Dragon
